attributes.action: do something about overweight members of the armed forces who can,t be sent out to places such as afghanistan because of there weight and being unfit due to it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
my daughter has been told she is being sent to afghanistan next year.she has not got a problem with this even though it will be her second time out there.she has allso served in iraq and was allso in bosnia and she is still only 22.her problem is that some  other members of the armed forces that she works with are deemed as being unfit to be sent out due to being overweight and because of this can,t manage pt.
they should be made to get fit and be sent out with there comrades or given a warning and then chucked out.
why should they be treated differently because they are overweight.
